description: Fortune-500 production-ready Player Profile for comprehensive musician CRM tracking, preferences, equipment, and service history.

fields.label: Player Profile ID
fields.description: Auto-generated unique identifier for this player profile

fields.label: Full Name
fields.description: Full legal name of the player

fields.label: Preferred Name
fields.description: Name the player prefers to be called

fields.label: Primary Email
fields.description: Primary email address for communication

fields.label: Primary Phone
fields.description: Primary phone number

fields.label: Mailing Address
fields.description: Complete mailing address for correspondence and shipping

fields.label: Profile Creation Date
fields.description: Date when this profile was first created

fields.label: Player Level
fields.options:
Student (Beginner)
Student (Advanced)
Amateur/Hobbyist
University Student
Professional (Orchestral)
Professional (Jazz/Commercial)
Educator
Collector
fields.description: Current skill/professional level of the player

fields.label: Primary Playing Style(s)
fields.description: Comma-separated list of playing styles: Orchestral, Chamber, Solo, Jazz, Klezmer, Contemporary, Concert Band

fields.label: Affiliation / Organization
fields.description: Current musical organization, orchestra, or educational institution

fields.label: Primary Teacher / Mentor
fields.description: Name of primary teacher or mentor

fields.label: Equipment Preference(s)
fields.description: Detailed equipment preferences for mouthpiece, ligature, reeds, barrel, etc.

fields.label: Key Height Preference
fields.description: Preferred key height setting for clarinet

fields.label: Spring Tension Preference
fields.description: Preferred spring tension for key action

fields.label: Preferred Pad Type
fields.description: Preferred type of clarinet pads (e.g., skin, synthetic, with or without resonators)

fields.label: G#/A Key Connection
fields.description: Preference for G#/A key connection type

fields.label: Tuning & Intonation Notes
fields.description: Notes about tuning preferences, intonation tendencies, or barrel length preferences

fields.label: Technician Notes
fields.description: Internal notes for technicians about special requirements or observations

fields.label: Instruments Currently Owned
fields.description: List of instruments currently owned by this player

fields.label: Last Visit Date
fields.description: Date of most recent visit or service interaction

fields.label: Customer Lifetime Value
fields.description: Total lifetime value from sales invoices linked to this player

fields.label: Communication Preference
fields.description: Preferred method of communication

fields.label: Newsletter Subscription
fields.description: Opt-in for newsletter subscription

fields.label: Targeted Marketing Opt-In
fields.description: Opt-in for targeted marketing communications

fields.label: Referral Source
fields.description: How this player heard about us (referral, search, social media, etc.)

fields.label: Profile Status
fields.description: Current status of this player profile

fields.label: Workflow State
fields.description: Internal workflow state tracking

name: Player Profile
